intro: Rheedia virens, commonly known as the green rheedia, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. Rheedia virens typically grows in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for both horticultural study and ecological research.
